description.raw:
On the plotting branch, the models section under search is covered by a mysterious rectangle:

![searchghost.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/1421890730-searchghost.png)

This was due to an extra column magically being added to the proxy search model. It was probably happening because we were changing the original model outside of the qt thread. Moving it to signals and slots solved the problem. 

Other nice things to try here are to play with inserting and deleting models as you use the search, for example:

1. Without any box in the world, search for "box". Nothing shows. 

2. While the search is there, insert a box, and it appears in the search results. 

3. Remove the box from the world and it disappears from the search.
description.html:
On the plotting branch, the models section under search is covered by a mysterious rectangle:

This was due to an extra column magically being added to the proxy search model. It was probably happening because we were changing the original model outside of the qt thread. Moving it to signals and slots solved the problem.

Other nice things to try here are to play with inserting and deleting models as you use the search, for example:

  1. Without any box in the world, search for "box". Nothing shows.

  2. While the search is there, insert a box, and it appears in the search results.

  3. Remove the box from the world and it disappears from the search.

title: Plotting: Fix ghost rectangle
